=============
File Sort App
=============


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/file_sort_app.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/file_sort_app

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/EyreC/file_sort_app.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/EyreC/file_sort_app

        :target: https://file-sort-app.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest

Interactive application to sort image files into folders.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://file-sort-app.readthedocs.io.
